title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: Interception Success Over Ziv Bridge”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Documentation: The IDF continues to strike Hezbollah terror targets in southern Lebanon; simultaneously, a suspicious aerial target was successfully intercepted over the maritime area near the Ziv Bridge.

During the last hour, Air Force fighter jets attacked several terror targets belonging to the Hezbollah terrorist organization in southern Lebanon. Among the targets struck were several of the organization’s infrastructures in the areas of a-Taybeh, al-Adaysah, and al-Jabain, as well as a military structure in the Ayta ash-Shab area.

Earlier this evening, air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspicious aerial target over the maritime area near the Ziv Bridge; no alert was activated according to policy.

Attached is documentation from the interception in the Ziv Bridge area: https://we.tl/t-vQ3jx5jTQG

Attached is documentation from the strikes: https://we.tl/t-quQgA1YKHW
